main(String[]) - Static method in class com.vtuberrush.src.main.Game
Creates a new instance of a game, initializes the input, and starts a thread.
MathFunctions - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.helpers
This class is responsible for handling mathematical operations such as calculating the distance of two objects for range calculations and for converting the dimensions of arrays when reading and writing level files.

MENU - Enum constant in enum class com.vtuberrush.src.main.GameStates
Builds a set of buttons in the window responsible for switching to other game states.
Set as default or when the player presses MENU from other game screens.

Checks the current game state of the program and runs the method related to moving the mouse.

MouseInput - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.input
Listens for mouse movement and input and runs the appropriate function related to the input.
Used for listening for LMB when clicking on buttons, clicking on units when playing, and clicking on tiles when editing.
Used for listening to mouse movement and detecting which unit or tile to select based on the current position of the mouse.
MouseInput(Game) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.input.MouseInput
Allows the mouse-related methods in this class to interact with other parts of the game.

Checks the current game state of the program and runs the method related to whether a mouse that was pressed is no longer being pressed.
Used to dynamically update buttons to show that it is being pressed and to update which units in the action bar and tool bar were previously selected.
